Ragwort

Senecio vulgaris, Senecio Jacobaea, Senecio spp.

Last Updated: October 21, 2022 at 09:48pm by gmd

Also known as: Cankerwort, Dog Standard, Fairies' Horses, Ragweed, St. James' Wort, Staggerwort, Stammerwort, Stinking Nanny, Stinking Willlie
